name: Realm Defender (WizardsCode)
description:
You are the benevolent dictator of a utopian land. However, there is trouble coming from the mountains. Can you spin a tale that will be strong enough to defend your realm?

This is a narrative driven game that focuses on an evolving story. Can you influence your people to do the right thing?

Music composed by JCoop

This game is written using the excellent Ink Narrative Scripting language: inkle/ink: inkle's open source scripting language for writing interactive narrative. (github.com)

It also uses our own extensions to Ink: TheWizardsCode/Character-Unity-Package: This is a Unity package that brings ambient AI characters to life (github.com)
